#summary The entrance point for the developer guide, listing it's chapters.
#labels Featured

= Introduction =
The following is a guide aimed towards the user-end of the epiClock, explaining it's features, how to control it, etc. All information in this guide will be front-facing. If you're looking for help understanding the back end code to edit the library and not implement it, you want the [User_Guide User Guide].

= Chapters =
  * [dev_design Understanding epiClock] - Major overview of the epiClock's structure
  * [dev_controller epiClock Controller] - Major overview of the Controller
  * [dev_clock epiClock Clock Object] - Major overview of the Clock
  * [dev_face epiClock Face Object] - Major overview of the Face.
